title: Page Section
label: Page Section
notes: A major section of a page

variants.name: vertical_margin
variants.title: Page Section w/ Vertical Margin
variants.label: Page Section w/ Vertical Margin
variants.notes: A major section of a page with vertical margin. Variations can include top and bottom margin (.my-4), just top margin (.mt-4), or just bottom margin (.mb-4) depending on what is needed for the page.

variants.name: vertical_padding
variants.title: Page Section w/ Vertical Padding
variants.label: Page Section w/ Vertical Padding
variants.notes: A major section of a page with vertical padding. Vertical padding is added either to the section element (as in this example) or to the columns within the section depending on the needs of the page.
